column2: American Express shares rise after report of potential sale NEW YORK
column3: March 7 American Express Co  shares rose more than 1 percent on Monday after Fox Business News reported that the financial services corporation might be acquired by Wells Fargo & Co or another financial firm.

March 7 Apparel retailer Urban Outfitters Inc  reported better-than-expected sales at established stores for its bohemian-inspired Free People brand.Urban Outfitters' Free People brand same-store sales beat estimates Apparel retailer Urban Outfitters Inc  reported better-than-expected sales at established stores for its bohemian-inspired Free People brand.

Verizon Wireless will pay $1.35 million fine to settle U.S. privacy probeUPDATE 2-Verizon Wireless to pay $1.35 mln fine to settle U.S. privacy probeVerizon Wireless to pay $1.35 million fine to settle U.S. privacy probe WASHINGTON Verizon Communications Inc  will pay a $1.35 million fine and agreed to a three-year consent decree after the Federal Communications Commission said on Monday it found the company's wireless unit violated the privacy of its users.  Verizon Wireless to pay $1.35 million fine to settle U.S. privacy probe WASHINGTON Verizon Communications Inc  will pay a $1.35 million fine and agreed to a three-year consent decree after the Federal Communications Commission said on Monday it found the company's wireless unit violated the privacy of its users. WASHINGTON
